Module it.polimi.ingsw
Package it.polimi.ingsw.santorini.view.cli

Class CLIPrinter

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.santorini.view.cli.CLIPrinter
public class CLIPrinter
extends java.lang.Object
Brief Class responsible for the printing of textual tables and the handling of the console's cursor's position

      row - is the row in the map

      Parameters:
      dimension - is the dimension
      row - is the row in the map
      column - is the column in the map

      values - is the List of values
      Returns:

    • printTable

      private int printTable​(java.lang.String header, int dimension, int row, int column, java.util.List<java.lang.String> tags, java.util.List<java.lang.String> tableValues)
      Brief Prints a table in a certain position (row, column) on the screen
      Parameters:
      header - indicates what the table is about
      dimension - is the width of the table
      row - is the column where to start printing the table
      column - is the column where to start printing the table
      tags - are the unique values' ids
      tableValues - are the actual values of the table
      Returns:
      the first free row under the printed table

      Parameters:
      header - is the header of the table
      tags - are the commands that can be used by the player
      values - are the values contained in the table
